entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:07 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salmon Arm 03:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: S 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
